name: payback
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.
short_effect: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: If the user can use this attack after the foe attacks, its power is doubled.
flavor_text.platinum: If the user can use this attack after the foe attacks, its power is doubled.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: If the user can use this attack after the foe attacks, its power is doubled.
